addBusiness.title: Ongeza Biashara Yako
addBusiness.subtitle: Orodhesha biashara yako kwenye saraka yetu ili kufikia wateja zaidi

steps.additionalDesc: Wasaidie wateja kuelewa huduma zako vizuri

addBusiness.businessNameDescription: Hivi ndivyo wateja watatambua biashara yako
addBusiness.descriptionDescription: Toa maelezo ya kina kuhusu biashara yako na huduma zako
addBusiness.logoDescription: JPG, PNG au GIF, upeo wa 2MB
addBusiness.featuredDescription: Orodha zilizoangaziwa zinaonekana juu ya matokeo ya utafutaji (ada za ziada zinaweza kutumika)
addBusiness.pleaseAgreeToTerms: Lazima ukubali masharti na masharti ya kuendelea
addBusiness.businessUnderReview: Biashara yako imewasilishwa na iko chini ya ukaguzi. Tutakujulisha mara baada ya kupitishwa.
addBusiness.pleaseTryAgain: Kulikuwa na makosa ya kuwasilisha biashara yako. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
